Package ch.pschatzmann.common.table

Converting of a table into a defined output format
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFieldModel  
    IForecast  
    IFormulas
    Interface for Formulas
    ITable<I>
    Table model
    ITableEx<T>
    ITable with Support for additional columns
    ITableFormatter<T>
    Formats the content of the table as String
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculationUtils  
    FieldModelLastN
    Just selects the last n fields
    FieldModelTopN
    Split all field maps into list of biggest values and others
    Formulas
    Implementation of Calculation Formulas which are used in TableCalculated
    TableBackedListOfMap<T>
    Converts a ITable to a List of Map entries
    TableCalculated
    Table which supports calculated columns which are specified with a formula.
    TableConsolidated
    ITable where we remove some key fields and consolidate the values with the help of the ConsolidationOperation.
    TableConsolidated.RowKey  
    TableFilteredOnCol
    Table where we can hide columns
    TableFilteredOnRow
    Table where we support the filtering of rows
    TableFormatterCSV<T>
    Output as CSV
    TableFormatterFactory
    Factory method which returns a formatter for the requested format
    TableFormatterHtml<T>
    Output as Html table
    TableFormatterJson<T>
    Creates JSON using the syntax used by Google Charts { cols: [{id: \"task\", label: \"Employee Name\", type: \"string\"}, {id: \"startDate\", label: \"Start Date\", type: \"date\"}], rows: [{c:[{v: \"Mike\"}, {v: new Date(2008, 1, 28), f:\"February 28, 2008\"}]}, {c:[{v: \"Bob\"}, {v: new Date(2007, 5, 1)}]}, {c:[{v: \"Alice\"}, {v: new Date(2006, 7, 16)}]}, {c:[{v: \"Frank\"}, {v: new Date(2007, 11, 28)}]}, {c:[{v: \"Floyd\"}, {v: new Date(2005, 3, 13)}]}, {c:[{v: \"Fritz\"}, {v: new Date(2011, 6, 1)}]} ] }
    TablePercent
    Calculates the percentage of the total.
    TablePercentChange
    Calculates the percentage change between the prior value.
    TablePositive
    Returns only absolute positive or negative values (if positive == false).
    TableTopN
    Returns a table with a limited number of rows and columns: We sort the rows and columns by their total in order to get the biggest values.
    Value
    Value which can represent a nubmer or a String
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TableConsolidated.ConsolidationOperation  
    TablePercentChange.PercentDimension  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FormatException
    Exceptions relate to the formatting for tables
